title: Quorum Health Corporation Completes Amendment of Senior Credit Facility and Schedules Broadcast of Fourth Quarter 2017 Conference Call
text:
BRENTWOOD, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Quorum Health Corporation (NYSE: QHC) announced today that the Company has completed an amendment to its existing senior credit facility. As disclosed in the press release on March 7, 2018, the Company will now provide an online web simulcast and rebroadcast of its fourth quarter 2017 conference call.
The Company will issue a press release announcing its financial results on Thursday, March 15, 2018, after the market closes. A conference call to discuss these results will be held the next day, Friday, March 16, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. Central time, 11:00 a.m. Eastern time. A live broadcast of the conference call will be available online at www.quorumhealth.com . To listen to the live call, please go to the web site at least 15 minutes prior to the call to register, download and install any necessary audio software.
During this call, the Company will review financial and operating results for the fourth quarter ended December 31, 2017.
About Quorum Health Corporation
Quorum Health Corporation is an operator of general acute care hospitals and outpatient services in the United States. Through its subsidiaries, the Company owns, leases or operates a diversified portfolio of 29 affiliated hospitals with an aggregate of approximately 2,750 licensed beds. The Company also operates Quorum Health Resources, LLC, a leading hospital management advisory and consulting services business. More information about Quorum Health Corporation can be found at www.quorumhealth.com .
